summary: The residents of vacation spot Seal Island find themselves terrorized by a pack of dogs -- the remnants of discarded pets by visiting vacationers.
cast: Joe Don Baker|Hope Alexander-Willis|Richard B. Shull|R.G. Armstrong|Ned Wertimer|Bibi Besch|Delos V. Smith Jr.|Richard O'Brien|Sherry E. DeBoer|Paul Willson|Eric Knight|Steve Lytle|Rob Narke|Peggy Price|Steve Butts|Heinrich|Carl Irwin
keywords: dog|killer dog|killed by a dog|feral dog|killing a dog
title: The Pack
